CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In conclusion , diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) units have successfully been incorporated into a D-A polymer backbone by Suzuki polymerization with 2,7-carbazole comonomer , affording a poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDSeBT ) ; This design motif is that replacement of thiophenes to selenophene units in PCDTBT that acts as a superior p - type photoactive material for PSCs , induces a lower bandgap ( 1.70 eV ) than that of PCDTBT ( 1.85 eV ) , while the ideal HOMO energy level ( -5.40 eV ) is still maintained.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material Name" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) |
| poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) (PCDSeBT) |
| PCDTBT |

I hope this corrected table meets your requirements.

Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In conclusion , diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) units have successfully been incorporated into a D-A polymer backbone by Suzuki polymerization with 2,7-carbazole comonomer , affording a poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDSeBT ) ; This design motif is that replacement of thiophenes to selenophene units in PCDTBT that acts as a superior p - type photoactive material for PSCs , induces a lower bandgap ( 1.70 eV ) than that of PCDTBT ( 1.85 eV ) , while the ideal HOMO energy level ( -5.40 eV ) is still maintained.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 1.70 eV |
| 1.85 eV |
| -5.40 eV |

The three property values mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. The bandgap of PCDSeBT, which is 1.70 eV.
2. The bandgap of PCDTBT, which is 1.85 eV.
3. The ideal HOMO energy level of PCDSeBT, which is -5.40 eV.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |

The two property values mentioned in the paragraph that clearly refer to the value of a material property are:

1. The bandgap of PCDSeBT, which is 1.70 eV.
2. The bandgap of PCDTBT, which is 1.85 eV.

The third entity mentioned, -5.40 eV, refers to the ideal HOMO energy level of PCDSeBT, but it does not clearly refer to the value of a material property and therefore should not be included in the table.
